Text: Never got a chance to read these when they first came out. Thanks STFmaryville!
no problem, i really think you will enjoy them. this is a series i am proud to torrent. enjoy!
Amazing that he did not go to jail.
I read that 68 was supposed to be double size. Sure it's complete?

HateMyJewHair, yes it's complete. Last summer, Larsen did say that #68 would be 80 pages. But it came out with 32 pages -- interestingly, it was solicited as a 32-pager. Larsen drew the last issue himself, so perhaps he changed his mind again once he started the work. But my guess is, he realized that a higher page count (with higher price) could make the orders returnable.

shazam101, well he could have but Larry Marder (then Executive Director of Image Comics) said that Liefeld paid back the money he had embezzled, in full. It was close to a quarter of a million dollars! This -- and a whole lot more -- is all printed in The Comics Journal #195 if anyone wants to read about it.
